kiwi.ui
Class ConsoleFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      kiwi.ui.KFrame
                          kiwi.ui.ConsoleFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, LoggingEndpoint, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ConsoleFrame
extends KFrame
implements LoggingEndpoint

A GUI console window. This class implements the LoggingEndpoint interface and as such can be used as the destination of log messages sent using that interface.


An example ConsoleFrame.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
Serialized Form
